commitMessage:
Fixed restart.sh script to properly start backend service in production mode

- Added proper production mode startup with NODE_ENV=production
- Using nohup to keep process running after script exits
- Redirecting output to logs/backend.log
- Storing PID in backend.pid file
- Added better startup check with 30-second timeout
- Created logs directory for output logging
